summary: Password reset feature testing completed successfully. Fixed critical frontend import issue and verified all backend endpoints and frontend pages work correctly.

critical_bugs_fixed.issue: Missing default export - ForgotPassword.js and ResetPassword.js were importing 'api' as default but api.js only had named exports
critical_bugs_fixed.fix_applied: Added axios instance as default export for public API calls

passed_tests: Backend: POST /api/auth/forgot-password with non-existent email (returns success to prevent enumeration)
Backend: POST /api/auth/forgot-password with invalid email format (returns 422)
Backend: GET /api/auth/verify-reset-token/ with empty token rejected
Backend: POST /api/auth/reset-password with invalid token returns error
Backend: POST /api/auth/reset-password with missing token returns 422
Backend: POST /api/auth/reset-password with missing password returns 422
Backend: POST /api/auth/login with invalid credentials returns 401
Frontend: Login page loads with 'Mot de passe oublié ?' link visible
Frontend: /forgot-password page displays email form correctly
Frontend: Forgot password form submission shows success message
Frontend: 'Retour à la connexion' navigation works
context_for_next_testing_agent: Password reset feature is fully functional. The api.js file was updated to include a default export for public API calls. All three password reset endpoints work correctly: forgot-password, verify-reset-token, and reset-password. Frontend pages ForgotPassword.js and ResetPassword.js are working with proper navigation and error handling.

features_verified.forgot_password_api: ✓ Returns success message, prevents email enumeration
features_verified.navigation_back_to_login: ✓ Works from both forgot-password and reset-password pages
